name: [website] Persian Google Chrome Frame - 2013
description: Google Chrome Frame, is one of the best known Plug-in's for Internet Explorer that enable cutting edge features on it. i made persian web page to introduce and deliver download link of this awesome plug-in for persian's all around the planet.

name: [website] Saeed Kahrobaee official webpage - 2012

name: [website] Media Literacy - 2011
description: medialiteracy is a social group that work on media literacy and media information and teach the way's of talking by media. i use wordpress a CMS and i developed some custom wordpress plug-in base on need's, i also make banner pattern for they to make banner and graphics faster, i also installed and configure wiki system for them.

name: [iOS, Android] ziarat ashura - 2011
description: this application provide easy access to text and audio of ziarat e ashura, with smooth scroll and easy ui design. i made this application on top of ios and android platform, with Phonegap framework and ExtJS sencha Touch. after a year, base on analytic's report, this app installed on more than +60000 android and ios devices. here is a link to cafebazzar.

name: [iOS, Android] ahd doa - 2011
description: this application provide easy access to text and audio of ahd doa, with smooth scroll and easy ui design. i made this application on top of ios and android platform, with Phonegap framework and ExtJS sencha Touch. after a year, base on analytic's report, this app installed on more than +15000 android and ios devices. here is a link to cafebazzar.

name: [iOS, Android] Mashhad Subway - 2011

picture.desc: Home Page of application show the nearest time of favorite station

description: i developed multi-platofrm iOS and Android app, called metro mashhad, this app helps people who use subway system to catch the train at the right time. published at iTunes app store and android bazaar (not official android market for iranian's)

description: Future City is a technology park placed at kuhsangi, Mashhad, Iran. they need's a way to introduce their services and goal's. so i decided to make a cd catalouge and provive what they want in it. i use flash and phtoshop in this project.

name: [website] Paradise Rug - 2008

name: [website] mana choob - 2006
description: Mana Choob is a company that work industrially on wood's design, they need's a web site on top of wordpress platform, with custom post's and custom template that made from scratch, and special image gallery.
